1268630.name: Day of Dragons - Blitz Striker Amphithere + Extras
1268630.description:
Become the Storm.

The Blitz Striker Amphithere is a dedicated Crowd Control specialist. It's abilities allow it to stun it's prey before eating it whole. Native to the tropical climates, the Blitz Striker thrives in dark jungles and lush rainforests where it can stalk its prey quietly and under cover. It's signature attack stuns all nearby predators without lightning protection, causing them to remain stunned for a short time.

The Blitz Striker is a class 4 carnivore that is capable of nesting and is able to take full advantage of thunder storms to fully recharge it's bile after summoning lightning.

Players who enjoy stunning their opponents and playing a crowd control support role will enjoy this unique playable dragon.

Blitz Striker DLC Includes:

  • Blitz Striker Amphithere Playable Character

  • Blitz Striker Amphithere Basic Character Emotes (Roar, Threaten, Friendly, Submission, Courtship)

  • Blitz Striker Amphithere Emote Pack (Love, Mourn, Challenge, Distress)

  • Blitz Striker Amphithere "Aftershock" Skin

  • Blitz Striker Amphithere Player Character Save Slot
